item.title: Crews (2018)
item.description: Development of a Collisionless Plasma Kinetic Solver and an Investigation of One-Dimensional Plasma Waves and Instabilities # Shielded potential of a test electron: document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() { renderMathInElement(document.body, { delimiters: [ {left: "$$", right: "$$", display: true}, {left: "\\[", right: "\\]", display: true}, {left: "$", right: "$", display: false}, {left: "\\(", right: "\\)", display: false} ], macros: { "\\lcm": "\\mathop{\\mathrm{lcm}}", "\\sen": '\\text{sen}\\,', "\\dd": "\\mathop{\\mathrm{d} #1}", "\\abs": "\\lvert #1 \\rvert"
